name: Certutil Initiated Connection
description: Detects a network connection intitiated by the certutil.exe tool. Attackers can abuse `certutil.exe` to download malware or offensive security tools.
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR OriginalFilename:/[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND (network.direction:/[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]/ AND destination.port:(80 OR 443 OR 135 OR 445)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\certutil.exe OR OriginalFilename:CertUtil.exe) AND (network.direction:true AND destination.port:(80 OR 443 OR 135 OR 445)))`
